projects.title: Agentic Code Analysis System
projects.subtitle: AutoGen / LangGraph • Debugging • RCA • Auto-remediation
projects.overview: Multi-agent platform for debugging, root-cause analysis, and automated remediation. Agents analyze code + logs, propose fixes, and generate artifacts (tests, docs, runbooks).
highlights: Planner → Analyzer → Critic loop with verification before final answer
Tooling: repo search, log triage, test generation, PR-ready patches
Guardrails: policy checks, PII masking, citation grounding
projects.impact: Revolutionized debugging workflows with autonomous agents; won TCS AI Hackathon 2025.

projects.title: Employee Scheduler Optimization Engine
projects.subtitle: Databricks ML + Gurobi • Workforce scheduling
projects.overview: Forecasting + optimization engine that generates compliant schedules under constraints (labor rules, demand, skills).
highlights: What-if scenario runs and explainable constraints
Batch + API serving patterns for enterprise scale
projects.impact: Improved scheduling accuracy by 25% and reduced labor costs by 10%, generating $150M+ ROI.
